tool_description: Poems by Walt Whitman (contained in Leaves of Grass from the Project Gutemberg)
name: Walt Whitman Poems
title: Walt Whitman Poems

api_list.name: Poems List
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://pafmon-walt-whitman-poems.p.rapidapi.com/poems/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "pafmon-walt-whitman-poems.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://pafmon-walt-whitman-poems.p.rapidapi.com/poems/{poem_name}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "pafmon-walt-whitman-poems.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
